HEADLINE:
This is in furtherance to our earlier letter dated November 08, 2021 intimating schedule of Investors' Concall and letters dated November 10, 2021 and November 11, 2021 providing Presentation made thereat and audio recording of the said investors' concall, respectively.
Transcript of the Q2FY21-22 Investors' Concall is now available on Company's website and can be accessed at: https://www.bosch.in/our-company/shareholder-information/

This is for your information and records.
